dashboard.no-cases: No cases are currently assigned to you.

confirm-privacy-notice-checkbox.title: I agree to the terms and conditions
confirm-privacy-notice-checkbox.required: Agreeing to the terms and conditions is required.

current-status-in-canada.title: Current status in Canada
current-status-in-canada.required: Current status in Canada is required.
current-status-in-canada.invalid: Please select Canadian Citizen born outside Canada.

options.certificate-of-registration-of-birth-abr: Certificate of Registration of Birth Abroad
options.birth-certificate-and-certificate-of-ind: Birth certificates and Certificates of Indian Status
options.certificate-of-canadian-citizenship-and-: Certificate of Canadian Citizenship and Certificate of Indian Status

request-details.select-scenario: Select the scenario that best describes the client's situation

scenarios.legal-guardian: Client is a parent or legal guardian applying on behalf of a minor or a dependent adult child
scenarios.legal-representative: Client is a legal representative applying on behalf of someone else
scenarios.as-employee: Client is a provincial/territorial employee applying on behalf of someone for whom they have legal authority
scenarios.estate-representative: Client is a legal representative of an estate requesting confirmation of SIN for a deceased person

requests.record-confirmation: SIN record amendment / Confirmation of SIN

recorded-name.description: The following name is recorded on the applicant's primary identity document:

preferred-name.description: Is the applicant's perferred name the same as their primary identity document name?

first-name-error.format-error: First name must not contain any digits.
first-name-error.max-length-error: First name must contain at most {{maximum}} character(s).

middle-name-error.format-error: Middle name must not contain any digits.
middle-name-error.max-length-error: Middle name must contain at most {{maximum}} character(s).

last-name-error.format-error: Last name must not contain any digits.
last-name-error.max-length-error: Last name must contain at most {{maximum}} character(s).

supporting-docs.title: Supporting documents
supporting-docs.description: A supporting document containing the applicant's preferred name(s) is required if the primary identity document does not contain the applicant's preferred name(s), and the change does not comply with naming rules.

doc-types.name-change: Certificate of legal change of name or Court Order
doc-types.notarial-certificate: Notarial Certificate (also called Notarial Adoption Certificate)
doc-types.resident-record: Request to Amend Record of Landing or Confirmation of Permanent Resident
doc-types.replace-imm1442: Replacement IMM1442 (WP, SP, or VR) with modification to name indicated in "Remarks"
doc-types.birth-certificate: Birth certificate contains family name to be registered
doc-types.citizenship-certificate: Certificate of Canadian Citizenship contains family name to be registered
